org.mitre.openid.connect.client.service.impl

Class StaticClientConfigurationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.openid.connect.client.service.impl.StaticClientConfigurationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientConfigurationService, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    public class StaticClientConfigurationService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientConfigurationService, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Client configuration service that holds a static map from issuer URL to a ClientDetails object to use at that issuer. Designed to be configured as a bean.
    Author:
    jricher
